sentences.en: A full study will be detailed in the journal Astronomy and Astrophysics.
sentences.cn: 全部研究资料将详细地记录在《天文学与天体物理学》杂志上.

sentences.en: But exactly what cut through the haze has been one of the big questions in astrophysics.
sentences.cn: 然而，究竟是什么驱散了烟雾？ 这一直是天体物理学上的一个重大问题之一。

sentences.en: Experimental Astrophysicist George Smoot is an active researcher in observational astrophysics and cosmology.
sentences.cn: 试验天体物理学家乔治-斯莫特是一位在活跃天体物理学和宇宙学领域非常活跃的科学家.

sentences.en: Future projects should similarly be world class, and occupy a unique niche in astrophysics.
sentences.cn: 今后的项目都应该向这样,变成世界级的, 独占天体物理一席之地.

sentences.en: His other scientific interests concern cosmology and high - energy astrophysics.
sentences.cn: 他的科学兴趣还包括宇宙论与 高能 天文学.

sentences.en: If they understood astrophysics, the aliens could confidently predict that the biosphere would face doom in a few billion years when the sun flares up and dies.
sentences.cn: 如果外星人懂得天体物理学，他们可能会自信地预测到，地球这个生物圈将在太阳燃烧并灭亡之后几十亿年之内面临毁灭。

sentences.en: In the present day, PCA is applied widely in many research fields of astrophysics.
sentences.cn: 目前, 主成分分析法被广泛应用于天体物理的诸多研究领域中.

sentences.en: Its observed findings are expected to have major contributions to high energy astrophysics.
sentences.cn: “硬X射线 调制望远镜”的观测结果将对高能天体物理学做出巨大贡献.

sentences.en: Moreover , space science and astrophysics offers students the knowledge of nature beyond the earth.
sentences.cn: 太空与天文物理让学生更上层楼,认识地球之外的自然界.

sentences.en: Nowadays astrophysics and astronomy have come to mean almost the same thing.
sentences.cn: 今天,天体物理学和天文学的含义已经变得差不多一样了.

sentences.en: Recently, my interest is in astrophysics, theoretical physics, and the philosophical meaning behind physics.
sentences.cn: 我近期的的主要兴趣在天体物理学 、 理论物理学 、 以及物理世界背后的哲学内涵.

sentences.en: Ride received a doctorate in astrophysics and free electron laser physics from Stanford.
sentences.cn: 莎莉在斯坦福大学获得天体物理学和自由电子激光物理的博士学位.
她搞定了天体物理学课程.

sentences.en: So for decades, astronomers have used it as a “standard candle” in the field of high-energy astrophysics.
sentences.cn: 因此几十年来，天文学家一直将其视为高能天体物理领域的“标准烛光”使用。

sentences.en: The introduction emphasized the thoroughly evolutionary nature of modern astrophysics.
sentences.cn: 在绪论中业已强调,现代天体物理学是彻底的承认演化的科学.

sentences.en: This paper introduces the proposition of non extensive entropy, and the application in astrophysics.
sentences.cn: 介绍了非广延熵的提出, 重点讨论了其在天体物理方面的应用.

sentences.en: Unless your physics specialty is deeply theoretical or has to do with astrophysics, you can usually find an industry job that is related to your work.
sentences.cn: 除非你的物理学专业极端理论化，或者是天体物理，否则你通常是可以在工业界找到一个相关的职位的。

sentences.en: We are entering here into one of the most complex domains in astrophysics.
sentences.cn: 这里我们涉及到了天体物理学中最复杂的领域之一.

sentences.en: We provide courses in the field of physics, astrophysics and mathematics.
sentences.cn: 我们提供物理 、 天体物理和数学领域的课程.

trans.tran_en: the scientific study of the chemical structure of the stars and the forces that influence them
